title: ‘The public needs to wake up’: Rhode Island mom detained at Logan for more than a week
author: Ross Cristantiello
bullets: Local News The woman, a legal permanent resident for 40 years, is being denied access to a lawyer while being held by Customs and Border Protection.

title: Stefon Diggs, Cardi B welcome baby boy as Patriots wide receiver puts up strong performance vs. Jets
author: Conor Roche
bullets: New England Patriots The announcement came during the Patriots' win over the Jets on Thursday.
Stefon Diggs and Cardi B went public with their relationship earlier this year.

title: Northeastern, Boston strike landmark agreements on PILOT and campus expansion
author: Beth Treffeisen
bullets: Local News “Boston thrives when our leading institutions match their global reach with a deep commitment to our neighborhoods,” Mayor Michelle Wu said in a statement.

Rodrique Ngowi / AP, File Boston and Northeastern University struck “landmark” agreements Thursday that clear the way for a major campus overhaul — including the redevelopment of Matthews Arena — and secure more than $130 million in payments and community benefits.
The new Institutional Master Plan includes $62.
